p: In estimating parameters and designing prevention strategies for infectious diseases, it is important to take into account mechanisms underlying the heterogeneity in immune responses [ 65] and in the population [ 34]. This paper combined a within-host immunological model of Ebola virus (EBOV) infection and an age- and demographic-specfic contact network to study EBOV epidemic. The multi-scale model reproduced major characteristics of EBOV epidemics and allowed finer assessments of the timing of vaccination strategies.
